CEL.gm_warning: The GM has restricted the use of confetti to GMs only!
CEL.title: Celebrate

gm-only.Name: GM Only
gm-only.Hint: If your players are abusing the confetti, enable this and prevent them shooting it.

confetti-multiplier.Name: Confetti Multiplier
confetti-multiplier.Hint: Multiplies the amount of confetti pieces fired. Set this high at your own peril!

confetti-scale.Name: Confetti Scale
confetti-scale.Hint: How big you want your confetti pieces to be.

confetti-color-base.Name: Confetti Colour Base
confetti-color-base.Hint: Confetti will be coloured with this as the base colour if enabled below.

confetti-style-choice.Name: Confetti Style Choice
confetti-style-choice.Hint: Default: Multi coloured confetti. | Base Colour: Confetti with the chosen base colour above. | Glitter: Sparkly colour cycling confetti. | Base Glitter: Glitter derived from the base colour.

confetti-glitter-deviation.Name: Glitter Colour Deviation
confetti-glitter-deviation.Hint: How much deviation from the starting colour you want when the glitter pieces are colour cycled.

mute.Name: Mute
mute.Hint: Mutes the sound. Silence is golden?

rapid-fire-limit.Name: Fire Rate Limit (Seconds)
rapid-fire-limit.Hint: Starts a cooldown after each shot. Highly recommended! (0 is no-limit)

show-button.Name: Show Button
show-button.Hint: (Requires reload) Disable if you are only interested in using it from macros/modules and/or the button conflicts with other module(s).
